abstract: The extra hour, called “Fox & Friends First,” is another sign of the increasing competition for morning viewers, even those watching well before the sun rises.
snippet: The extra hour, called “Fox & Friends First,” is another sign of the increasing competition for morning viewers, even those watching well before the sun rises.
lead_paragraph: 6:07 p.m. | Updated The Fox News Channel is adding a 5 a.m. hour to its morning television franchise “Fox & Friends,” highlighting the increasingly intense competition for viewers before dawn.

headline.main: ‘Fox & Friends’ to Add an Hour by Starting at 5 a.m.
